charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] followed a nice smell
coming from a cave.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_0400: I just finished cooking. Wanna eat with me?
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0401_0600: Heh, I don’t blame you for asking.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0402_0800:
Hehe! It’s an Arven original, packed full
of herbs!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0402_0900: I have a reason why I was making this dish.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1000:
When I found this place, memories with Mabosstiff
and my buds in Paldea came back to me...
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1100:
I made a sandwich using this rare ingredient
called Herba Mystica, and we ate that sandwich
together in a cave.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1200: So before I realized it, I was cooking here, too
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1300: My Mabosstiff looks all fine and healthy now...
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1400:
but until recently he was in pretty rough shape,
since he’d been badly injured.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1500:
It wasn’t an average illness or injury, and even
Potions and Pokémon Centers were unable to
help him.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1600:
But I was desperate to find a way, because I was
gonna heal him no matter what.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1700:
After all, Mabosstiff has always been by my side.
He’s my precious family.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1800:
I tried many different treatments, but none of them
really worked.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_1900:
I was about to give up, but then I discovered the
existence of Herba Mystica!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2000:
Herba Mystica are super rare ingredients that are
very nourishing!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2100:
With help from my bud, we ran around Paldea
looking for Herba Mystica!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2200:
Our hard work paid off, and we managed to find
all of the Herba Mystica, and Mabosstiff is back to
full health!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2300: As you can see, he’s bursting with energy now!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2400:
He won’t stop moaning at me, saying he wants to
battle sync pairs on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0301_2500: The power of cooking is amazing!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0401_2600:
Mental and physical health both start from the diet!
It’s really important to eat, you know?
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0302_2700:
The Herba Mystica sound
really mysterious!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_0402_2800:
Yeah! When I first saw the effects I was surprised
as well!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_2900:
Look at you all interested in cooking,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3000: I could teach you my secret recipes if you want!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3100: You can’t find Herba Mystica on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3200:
But it wouldn’t hurt to learn the recipes, just in
case something happens to your precious partner
Pokémon, right?
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3300: But you have to promise me...
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3400:
when you make the dish, let us be the first ones to
taste it!
charaepi_ch0317_00_pepper/2301_1201_3500:
Whoops, got a bit long-winded there.
Anyway, enough talk...
